name: Dr. Emily Carter
advice: Regular check-ups are the best way to keep your pets healthy and detect issues early before they become serious.

name: Dr. Rani Malhotra
advice: Healthy skin means a happy pet — maintain good hygiene and use vet-approved grooming products.

name: Dr. Sarah Nguyen
advice: Exotic pets need specialized diets and care — always research your pet's natural environment before bringing them home.

name: Dr. James Thompson
advice: A balanced diet and daily activity can prevent many mobility problems as pets age. Keep them moving, but safely!
